thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 4 of 95
thread.title: Phillip

author: Phillip
title: Phillip
text:
Company has a great smelling product, when I first smelt it I got on their website to look it up, the website was easy to navigate and offered an easy way to purchase product, shipping was super fast and arrived in a very well packaged decorative box that was also wrapped inside a thicker grey cardboard box, the entire package was then wrapped in a box and labeled for shipment, upon getting my Dior I looked at and test sprayed them. I noticed one of the complimentary vials was slightly messed up, I emailed them expecting perhaps instructions to re align the nozzle but instead and got a quick reply that contained an apology and a note saying they was sending another directly out, the level of customer service was unexpected and appreciated, I also had sent them an email asking the difference of two product and had received a response with detailed comparison of the two products, as stated great customer service.
Great smelling product and customer service to match.
